DR DANJUMA SULE
NIGERIAN PETROLEUM CORPORATION,
FALOMO,
LAGOS.


URGENT BUSINESS PROPOSAL.

I AM DR. DANJUMA SULE AN ACCOUNTANT AT THE NIGERIAN PETROLEUM CORPORATION (NNPC), FALOMO LAGOS.
I HAVE A  TRANSACTION WHICH INVOLVES THE TRANSFER OF A HUGE AMOUNT OF MONEY. BEING THE TOTAL SUM OF THIRTY SIX MILLION, FIVE HUNDRED AND SIXTY ONE UNITED STATES DOLLARS WHICH WE INTEND  TO TRANSFER INTO  ANY FOREIGN ACCOUNT WHICH YOU MAY BE ABLE TO PROVIDE.
.
WE HERE ARE READY TO GIVE TO YOU AND YOUR COMPANY  25% OF THE SAID AMOUNT OF USD 36,561,000.00 IF YOU WOULD BE OUR PARTNER FOR THIS TRANSACTION.
THE TRANSACTION IS COMPLETELY RISK FREE AND WOULD COMPLETE UNDER 6 WORKING DAYS FROM THE DAY WHICH THE ACCOUNT AND  THE PAYMENT APPLICATION WOULD BE READY.

I WANT YOU TO CONSIDER THIS OFFER SERIOUSLY IF YOU CAN HANDLE THIS TYPE OF TRANSACTION DUE TO THE LARGE AMOUNT PLEASE EMAIL TO ME.

THESE FUNDS HAVE COME TO US FROM SOME OVER-INFLATED CONTRACTS HERE AT THE PETROLEUM CORPORATION. ALSO AS CIVIL SERVANTS WE ARE PROHIBITED FROM HAVING FOREIGN ACCOUNT HENCE WE NEED YOUR ASSISTANCE MOST URGENTLY.
THIS IS ALSO A HIGHLY CONFIDENTIAL MATTER SO PLEASE KEEP THIS MATTER HIGHLY CONFIDENTIAL DUE TO OUR POLITICAL POSITIONS HERE AS TOP CIVIL SERVANTS, NOW SERVING FOR OVER 35 YEARS.

I WILL PROCEED TO GIVE TO YOU THE DETAILS OF THIS TRANSACTION WHEN YOU INCATE YOUR INTEREST ALSO SEND TO ME YOUR PHONE NUMBER WHERE I CAN REACH YOU FOR MORE DISCUSSIONS.

I AWAIT TO HEAR FROM YOU AS SOON AS POSSIBLE.

.
REGARDS,

DR DANJUMA SULE.

N.B

PLEASE WHEN REPLYING THIS MAIL, KINDLY REPLY IT TO danjum_90@yahoo.com
